Clickup Internal tool for increasing likes on the Linkdln Posts.
This tool is designed for the personal employed of the Clickup to automate the linking on the clickup posts through their linkdln id,without storing any perosnal information.
This tool could only be used by verified clickUp Employes,
This tool activate at a certain time of a day ,it open the linkdln post,fetch link  from  Database based on the employee email and hence like the post.

Its saved the time of employee and hence increases the reach of the post.
